summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of LiquiFlow on-chain analytics MVP. All critical issues from previous iteration have been resolved. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate) and frontend is now working perfectly with custom SVG flow visualization replacing the problematic Sankey chart.
passed_tests: Backend API Root endpoint (200 OK)
Dashboard Stats API (Volume 24h: $1.74B, Transactions: 191K, Active Entities: 95K)
Networks API (4 networks: Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum)
Entities API with pagination and filters (network, entity_type)
Entity Detail API with counterparties and balances
Transactions API with filters (network, tx_type, value ranges)
Transaction Detail API with internal transactions
Pools API with liquidity and protocol filters
Pool Detail API with LP holders and recent events
Alerts API with severity and type filters
Flow Graph API (nodes and links generation)
Search API (global search functionality)
Price History API (ETH 7d data with 168 data points)
All filter parameters (network, entity_type, tx_type, severity)
Dashboard page loads with all stats cards displaying correctly
Flow Graph page renders SVG visualization without errors
Navigation between all pages works (Dashboard, Flow Graph, Entities, Transactions, Pools, Alerts)
Entities page shows entity cards with filters
Transactions page shows transaction list
Pools page shows liquidity pool cards
Alerts page shows alerts with severity filters
Search functionality in header works correctly
Network selector in header functions properly
Connect Wallet button is present and clickable
Mobile responsive design works correctly
SVG flow visualization displays nodes and connections properly
Flow graph filters (network selector, node limit slider) work correctly
Entity type legend displays correctly
Entity list shows all entities in graph
Node clicking functionality works (shows details panel)
Mobile menu functionality works correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all pages load correctly, navigation works, SVG visualization functional)
